#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}



int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
  RaftServer& svr = GetRaftServer();
  
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);

  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t term=0;

  auto leader = svr.Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  //Log_info("%d started the wait for cosleep for PUT",svr.loc_id_);

  if(leader){
  //Log_info("%d is the leader",svr.loc_id_);
  }

  else if(leader==false){
  //Log_info("trying for the wrong server, leader isn't %d",svr.loc_id_);
  return KV_NOTLEADER;
}
  
  Coroutine::Sleep(350000);
  //Log_info("%d done with wait for cosleep for PUT",svr.loc_id_);

if(ops.find(to_string(oid)) != ops.end() && leader==true) {
  //Log_info("%d: KV PAIR SUCCESSFULLY INSERTED",svr.loc_id_);
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}
  //Log_info("log not inserted in leader so timing out %d",svr.loc_id_);
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
      RaftServer& svr = GetRaftServer();
  
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  
  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t term=0;

  auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);

  auto leader = svr.Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  //Log_info("%d started the wait for cosleep for APP",svr.loc_id_);
  
  if(leader){
    //Log_info("%d is the leader",svr.loc_id_);
  }

  else if(leader==false){
  //Log_info("trying for the wrong server, leader isn't %d",svr.loc_id_);
  return KV_NOTLEADER;
}
 
  Coroutine::Sleep(350000);
  //Log_info("%d done with wait for cosleep for APP",svr.loc_id_);

if(ops.find(to_string(oid)) != ops.end() && leader==true) {
  //Log_info("%d: KV PAIR SUCCESSFULLY APPENDED",svr.loc_id_);
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}
  
  //Log_info("log not appended in leader so timing out %d",svr.loc_id_);


  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
     RaftServer& svr = GetRaftServer();
  
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  
  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t term=0;

  auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);

  auto leader = svr.Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  //Log_info("%d started the wait for cosleep for GET",svr.loc_id_);

  if(leader){
  //Log_info("%d is the leader",svr.loc_id_);
  }

  else if(leader==false){
  //Log_info("trying for the wrong server, leader isn't %d",svr.loc_id_);
  return KV_NOTLEADER;
}
    Coroutine::Sleep(350000);
    //Log_info("%d done with wait for cosleep for GET",svr.loc_id_);


if(ops.find(to_string(oid)) != ops.end() && leader==true) {
  //Log_info("%d: KV PAIR FETCHED",svr.loc_id_);
  *v=kv_store_[k];
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}
  
  //Log_info("log not getting in leader so timing out %d",svr.loc_id_);
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  string op = v->data_[1];
  if(op=="put"){
    ops.insert(v->data_[0]);
    kv_store_[v->data_[2]]=v->data_[3];
    //Log_info("Putting value %s for %s",v->data_[2],v->data_[3]);
  }
  else if(op=="append"){
    ops.insert(v->data_[0]);
    kv_store_[v->data_[2]]=kv_store_[v->data_[2]]+(v->data_[3]);
    //Log_info("appending value %s for %s",v->data_[2],v->data_[3]);
    //Log_info("%s now has value %s",v->data_[2],kv_store_[v->data_[2]]);
  }
  else{
    //Log_info("going to attempt to fetch value");
    ops.insert(v->data_[0]);
    //Log_info("Succeeded to fetch value");
  }
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
